mapper.select: select boardname from BOARD where id=#{id}
select * from ARTICLE order by DATE_CREATED desc
select * from ARTICLE where BOARD_ID=#{id} and (case when #{search_style}='title' then TITLE ELSE WRITER end) like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select b.BOARDNAME,a.* from BOARD b,ARTICLE a where b.id=a.BOARD_ID and a.WRITER_id=#{writer_id} order by a.date_created desc

select b.BOARDNAME,a.BOARD_ID,c.id,a.TITLE, c.article_id, c.CONTENT,c.DATE_CREATED from BOARD b,COMMENTS c,ARTICLE a where b.id=a.BOARD_ID and a.ID=c.ARTICLE_ID and c.WRITER_ID=#{writer_id} order by c.date_created desc
mapper.insert: insert into article(id, board_id, title, writer, writer_id, up_cnt, view_cnt, text, date_created, category, visible, comment_cnt) values (null, #{board_id}, #{title},#{writer},#{writer_id},0,0,#{text},sysdate,#{category},'1',0)
mapper.select: select c.*,u.NICKNAME from COMMENTS c,USERS u where c.WRITER_ID=u.id and ARTICLE_ID=#{id}
select a.*,u.NICKNAME from ARTICLE a,USERS u where a.WRITER_ID=u.id and a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update ARTICLE set COMMENT_CNT=COMMENT_CNT+1 where ID=#{article_id}
update ARTICLE set COMMENT_CNT=COMMENT_CNT-1 where ID=#{article_id}
update COMMENTS set CONTENT=#{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from article a, board b where a.board_id = b.id and b.id=#{id}
